name: onu mac地址上报测试
description:
用例描述
    测试目的： 测试onu端口mac地址学习是否正常
    测试步骤：
    步骤1: 发现未注册的ONU
    步骤2: 在OLT上通过SN的方式将ONU注册上线
    步骤3: 配置虚端口vlan2000透传
    步骤4: 打流测试,查看onu端口mac地址表
    1）上下行各发送流00:00:00:22:22:21递增5条，在olt上查看onu端口mac地址表
    预期结果: 上下行正常通，在olt上查看onu端口mac地址表有5条（00:00:00:22:22:21递增5条）
descriptionHtml:
用例描述
测试目的： 测试onu端口mac地址学习是否正常
测试步骤：
步骤1: 发现未注册的ONU
步骤2: 在OLT上通过SN的方式将ONU注册上线
步骤3: 配置虚端口vlan2000透传
步骤4: 打流测试,查看onu端口mac地址表
1）上下行各发送流00:00:00:22:22:21递增5条，在olt上查看onu端口mac地址表
预期结果: 上下行正常通，在olt上查看onu端口mac地址表有5条（00:00:00:22:22:21递增5条）
statusTrace:
login = <telnetlib.Telnet object at 0x000001F6308ECC18>

    @allure.feature("onu mac地址上报测试")
    @allure.story("onu mac地址上报测试")
    @allure.title("onu mac地址上报测试")
    @pytest.mark.run(order=18)
    def test_ont_mac_learn(login):
        '''
        用例描述
        测试目的： 测试onu端口mac地址学习是否正常
        测试步骤：
        步骤1: 发现未注册的ONU
        步骤2: 在OLT上通过SN的方式将ONU注册上线
        步骤3: 配置虚端口vlan2000透传
        步骤4: 打流测试,查看onu端口mac地址表
        1）上下行各发送流00:00:00:22:22:21递增5条，在olt上查看onu端口mac地址表
        预期结果: 上下行正常通，在olt上查看onu端口mac地址表有5条（00:00:00:22:22:21递增5条）
        '''
    
        cdata_info("=========ONU MAC地址上报测试=========")
        tn = login
        Vlan_list = [2000]
        with allure.step('步骤1:发现未注册的ONU。'):
            assert autofind_onu(tn, PonID,  OnuID, SN)
        with allure.step('步骤2:在OLT上通过SN的方式将ONU注册上线。'):
            assert auth_by_sn(tn ,PonID, OnuID, Ont_Lineprofile_ID, Ont_Srvprofile_ID, SN)
        with allure.step("步骤3:配置虚端口vlan2000透传"):
            assert add_service_port(tn, PonID, OnuID, Gemport_ID, Vlan_list)
        with allure.step("步骤4:打流测试,查看onu端口mac地址表"):
            # 清除测试仪的对象，防止影响下个用例的执行
            time.sleep(3)
            reset_rom_cmd = ResetROMCommand()
            reset_rom_cmd.execute()
    
            # 发流量测试，发送两条流2000+pri2，和vlan2000+pri3
            port_location = ['//192.168.0.180/1/9', '//192.168.0.180/1/10']
            duration = 5
            down_stream_header = (
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:11 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:21',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:12 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:22',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:13 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:23',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:14 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:24',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:15 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:25',)
    
            up_stream_header = (
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:21 vlan_1.id=2000 ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:11',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:22 vlan_1.id=2000 ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:12',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:23 vlan_1.id=2000 ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:13',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:24 vlan_1.id=2000 ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:14',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:25 vlan_1.id=2000 ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:15',
            )
            # 获取所有流量的统计值
            result_stats = unicast_test(port_location=port_location, down_stream_header=down_stream_header,
                                        up_stream_header=up_stream_header, num=5, dataclassname=PortStats,
                                        duration=duration)
    
            #判断流上下行接收是否正常
            result_stream  = check_port_static(result_stats[0],result_stats[1])
            #判断olt上是否能查看onu学习的mac地址
            tn = login
            result_show = ont_mac_learn(tn,ponid=PonID,ontid=OnuID,ethid=Ont_Port_ID)
            result_mac = 'PASS'
            for i in range(len(result_show)):
                if '00:00:00:22:22:21'==result_show[i]:
                    continue
                elif '00:00:00:22:22:22'==result_show[i]:
                    continue
                elif '00:00:00:22:22:23'==result_show[i]:
                    continue
                elif '00:00:00:22:22:24'==result_show[i]:
                    continue
                elif '00:00:00:22:22:25'==result_show[i]:
                    continue
                else:
                    result_mac='FAIL'
    
            if result_mac == 'PASS':
                cdata_error("ONT MAC地址上报:MAC地址学习正常")
            else:
                cdata_error("ONT MAC地址上报:MAC地址学习失败")
    
            if result_stream == 'PASS':
                cdata_error("ONT MAC地址上报:打流正常")
            else:
                cdata_error("ONT MAC地址上报:打流失败")
    
>           assert result_stream=='PASS' and result_mac =='PASS'
E           AssertionError: assert ('fail' == 'PASS'
E             - fail
E             + PASS)

test_onu_mac_learn.py:116: AssertionError

    @allure.feature("onu mac地址上报测试")
    @allure.story("onu mac地址上报测试")

    @pytest.mark.run(order=18)
    def test_ont_mac_learn(login):

            reset_rom_cmd = ResetROMCommand()
            reset_rom_cmd.execute()
    
            # 发流量测试，发送两条流2000+pri2，和vlan2000+pri3
            port_location = ['//192.168.0.180/1/9', '//192.168.0.180/1/10']
            duration = 5

                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:11 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:21',
                'ethernetII_1.sourceMacAdd=00:00:00:11:11:12 vlan_1.id=2000  ethernetII_1.destMacAdd=00:00:00:22:22:22',
